Case: Abigail-Whaley-MVA-10-24-2024
Client: Abigail Whaley

Was towed by PD. Need to find where it is. St. Mathews PD responded. Officer is R. Banta 9187. Report # STM242451. My insurance is with SafeCo. Policy number is K4255732.
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on October 24, 2024 with Abigail Whaley regarding a motor vehicle accident. Ms. Whaley reported that her vehicle was towed by the police department and that the location of the vehicle needed to be determined. St. Mathews PD responded to the scene, with Officer R. Banta (badge 9187) assigned to the case. The incident was recorded under report number STM242451.

Ms. Whaley also stated that her auto insurance is with SafeCo and provided policy number K4255732.
episodes.author: Justin Chumbley

about.relevance: PIP claim associated with client's insurer

__New Insurance Note:__ 11/4 spoke with PD adjuster. confirmed vehicle was in fact picked up on 11/1. Appraiser has inspected and is currently creating his report. Adjuster is awaiting report to confirm total loss. Should have an answer by 11/5
__Insurance Type:__ Personal Injury Protection (PIP)
__Insurance Company:__ SafeCo Insurance Company
__Written by:__ Justin Chumbley
 #Inotes
episodes.natural_language:
Case Abigail-Whaley-MVA-10-24-2024 involves the client Abigail Whaley.

New Insurance Note: On November 4, 2024, the PD adjuster confirmed that the vehicle was picked up on November 1, 2024. The appraiser has inspected the vehicle and is currently preparing his report. The adjuster is awaiting the appraiser’s report to confirm whether the vehicle is a total loss, with an answer anticipated by November 5, 2024. The insurance type is Personal Injury Protection (PIP) under SafeCo Insurance Company. This note was written by Justin Chumbley.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

about.relevance: confirmed vehicle pickup and awaiting appraiser's report on total loss status

episodes.original_body:
Case: Abigail-Whaley-MVA-10-24-2024
Client: Abigail Whaley

Generated and saved certified medical records requests for all 4 medical providers: (1) William Haney, (2) Baptist Health Medical Group Neurology, (3) ProRehab Prospect, and (4) Norton Hospital - Brownsboro. All requests include HIPAA authorization reference, certification requirement per KRS 422.317, and request for complete itemized billing. Follow-up date set for 01/15/2026 (30 days). Case advanced to Phase 3 - Demand and Negotiation as client has completed treatment.
episodes.natural_language:
Case Abigail-Whaley-MVA-10-24-2024 involves client Abigail Whaley following a motor vehicle accident. Certified medical records requests were generated and saved for all four medical providers: (1) William Haney, (2) Baptist Health Medical Group Neurology, (3) ProRehab Prospect, and (4) Norton Hospital - Brownsboro. Each request includes a HIPAA authorization reference, the certification requirement per KRS 422.317, and a request for complete itemized billing.

Follow-up date set for 01/15/2026 (30 days). The case has advanced to Phase 3 - Demand and Negotiation as the client has completed treatment.
episodes.author: Roscoe (AI Paralegal)
